title: Flash And The Pan - Burning Up The Night (1992)@flac
description:
"Burning Up The Night" was the last release. And that was in 1992. This cd is mostly keyboards and less guitar than what fans are used to, but still is catchy with lots of hooks. 
As with all their albums, it's impossible to pick a favorite. For Flash & The Pan fans an absolute must. The sound is a bit different from their prior outings but still astonishing. 
If you see it listed, get it, since it's hard to come by and that chance may never come again. (from Amazon)
